config.ignoregender.name: Ignore gender
config.ignoregender.tooltip: Whether to ignore the rabbit's gender.
config.accountforhappiness.name: Account for happiness
config.accountforhappiness.tooltip: Whether to include fertility bonus based on the rabbit's happiness.
config.accountforfriendship.name: Account for friendship
config.accountforfriendship.tooltip: Whether to include fertility bonus based on the rabbit's friendship with the player.
config.accountforseason.name: Account for season
config.accountforseason.tooltip: Whether to include fertility bonus or penalty based on the current season.
config.accountforage.name: Account for age
config.accountforage.tooltip: Whether to include fertility bonus or penalty based on the rabbit's age.
config.allowmultiples.name: Allow multiples
config.allowmultiples.tooltip: Whether to allow multiple offspring at once (size is determined by fertility).
config.namenewrabbits.name: Name new rabbits
config.namenewrabbits.tooltip:
Whether to name newly born rabbits.
If disabled, a random name will be generated instead.
config.baserate.name: Base fertility rate
config.baserate.tooltip:
Base fertility rate before bonuses.
A value of 42 means an average of 42 days between births before fertility bonuses and penalties are taken into account.
strings.birthingmessage.single: During the night, {{animalName}} gave birth to 1 baby rabbit.
strings.birthingmessage.multiple: During the night, {{animalName}} gave birth to a litter of {{birthCount}} baby rabbits.
strings.namingmenu.title: Name your new baby rabbit ({{namesRemaining}} {{namesRemainingString}} remaining)
